headline: Former EquipmentShare Director and Romulus Co-Founder Chheda Faces Suit Over Lies to Investors – 9fin
summary: By CorpGov Editorial Staff Romulus Capital Co-Founder Neil Chheda has been accused of defrauding investors through misinformation around a nonexistent person and other antics in his former role as director of EquipmentShare, according to an article by 9fin published this week. Privately-held EquipmentShare, which has been reported as planning an IPO, has been at loggerheads […] The post Former EquipmentShare Director and Romulus Co-Founder Chheda Faces Suit Over Lies to Investors – 9fin appeared
